name: @dexwox/a2a-node
description: A2A Node SDK - TypeScript Implementation of Agent-to-Agent Protocol

scripts.build: pnpm run build:core && pnpm run build:client && pnpm run build:server
scripts.build:core: cd packages/core && pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.build:client: cd packages/client && pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.build:server: cd packages/server && pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
